anthropic_config.system: I want my Gemini to make make smarter, it should use bold text for headings and emojis. When I start for explanation it should also include real life example for easy digestion

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""I want my Gemini to make make smarter, it should use bold text for headings and emojis. When I start...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
